name: A-Train: All Aboard! Tourism
overview: A-Train: All Aboard! Tourism is a city simulation game by Artdink. It is the first entry in the A-Train series for the Nintendo Switch and serves as the 35th anniversary game. The major new mechanic is a tourism feature. It feature character art by Yuji Himukai, an artist known for their work on the Etrian Odyssey series. Become the president of your very own railroad company, laying tracks and running your trains as you see fit. However, you're responsible for more than just the railroad! You'll also be tasked with managing subsidiaries, playing the stock market and participating in urban planning, in order to develop and expand your town.
